Text:
I've just come across your material for the first time, @neil1966hardy, and I am loving it. It started with my recent purchase of a Samsung Stratoshphere (my first smartphone) and searching for software to convert PDFs to smaller EPUBs.

But your collection, though eclectic, is right up my alley.

I thank you!
I agree, I love all neil1966hardy's d/ls
Indeed, couldn't agree more about the quality of this u/ld'ers content. Thank you very much neil1966hardy for all the effort you put in, I truly apprecite it.
